title: Legends of the Brethren Court Series by Rob Kidd (Retail ePUB)
description:
Legends of the Brethren Court Series by Rob Kidd


Overview: Rob Kidd is a pen name for a group of women that Disney hired to write the prequels of the character Jack Sparrow from the Pirates of the Caribbean movies.


Genre: Fiction, Young Adult


This series contains these books:
*The Caribbean (#1)
*Rising in the East (#2)
*The Turning Tide (#3)
*Wild Waters (#4)
*Day of the Shadow (#5)


The Caribbean (#1)
Captain Jack Sparrow must reluctantly rely on the help of his untrustworthy first mate, Barbossa, and a ragtag crew as they take on the Shadow Lord.


Rising in the East (#2)
Jack must work with Mistress Ching and Sao Feng to stop the Shadow Lord. But pirates are notoriously bad at working as a team . . . .


The Turning Tide (#3)
In the midway point of the epic Legends series, Jack Sparrow finds himself lost in the peaks of the Himalayas as an army of shadows amasses to destroy the Pirate Lords.


Wild Waters (#4)
More Pirate action comes your way in the fourth installement of the Legends of the Brethren Court series!


Day of the Shadow (#5)
An army of shadows has been amassed. Its one goal: to destroy the Pirate Lords for their Shadow Master--an alchemist who has created a special gold that grants him unfathomable power. But the soothsayer, Tia Dalma has other plans for the Lords and cannot allow them to be destroyed. So she calls on the one man who can turn the tide--Captain Jack Sparrow...
